common.copy_get_started: Copy the code to get started

banner.title: More Than Just an Accordion
banner.description: Prismium allows you to create the most modern accordion in a couple of clicks that fits any design (after all, you can decide for yourself how it will look, or use preset themes).

easy_to_use.title: Easy to Use
easy_to_use.description: A simple and clear API that allows you to quickly and easily create accordions. You don't need to worry about how it works under the hood, just use it.

available_for.title: Prismium is available for
available_for.description: Prismium is a library that works with any framework that supports Vanilla JS. You can use Prismium with React, Vue, and other frameworks. Just import the library and use it in your project.

select_you_theme.title: Choose your Prismium style
select_you_theme.description: Or create your own stylish accordion using CSS. Prismium lets you easily customize the accordion styles to match your design. You can use preset themes or create your own.

animations.title: Use modern animations
animations.description: Also, you always have the possibility to implement a custom animation.

attention.title: Attention to the details
attention.description:
Control even the smallest details of your application.
Prismium lets you customize every aspect of your app to make it unique. You can adjust colors, fonts, sizes, spacing, animations, icons, and much more.

accessibility.title: Excellent accessibility
accessibility.description: Thanks to modern technologies, Prismium is accessible to all users. You have themes for visually impaired users, as well as RTL support.

compatibility.title: Compatibility with all browsers
compatibility.description: Prismium supports all modern browsers and devices. We test Prismium on all popular browsers and devices to ensure that it works flawlessly.
compatibility.description_2: Also, you can use Prismium on mobile devices and tablets. Prismium adapts to any screen size and resolution to provide the best user experience with your application.

use_prismium.title: Use Prismium in the most unexpected places
use_prismium.description: With Prismium, you can create not only regular accordions but also many other interface elements. For example, you can use it to create filters, comparisons, cards, etc.

seo_home_page.title: Create a modern accordion in just a few clicks with Prismium for Vue, React, and Vanilla JavaScript
seo_home_page.description: Prismium is a modern library for creating accordions, allowing you to build beautiful and responsive accordions with minimal effort. It supports various styles and themes, and provides numerous customization options. It supports both Vue and React, and is fully compatible with Vanilla JavaScript.
